The Desktop App

Introduction
To run ownCloud Web with full satisfaction, some requirements must be met. Though older versions may work without any issues, ownCloud can only give support for the described requirements. The Desktop App
Complementary to ownCloud Web, you may install the
Desktop App
, available for Windows, macOS and Linux, which enables you to sync your environment with your local device. ownCloud Web provides basic functionality on mobile devices, but not all features are available. For mobile devices, the installation of the free Android or iOS App is required:
Android App
Google Play Store
iOS App
Apple App Store

Desktop Requirements
When using a desktop device like a PC, Notebook including Microsoft Surface, the following browsers are supported:
Browser
Supported Version
Operating System
Chrome
Latest 2 versions
Windows 10+
macOS 12.5+
Linux
Firefox
Latest 2 versions
Windows 10+
macOS 12.5+
Linux
Edge
Latest 2 versions
Windows 10+
Safari
16+
macOS 12.6+
Additional Information
Touch input is supported on desktop devices. Mobile Requirements
Note that Microsoft Surface tablets have the same category as desktop devices. In most cases the screen is just too small to show all elements in a proper manner, though it may work on tablets.
The required minimum resolution is 1280 x 720 px.

Unsupported Browsers
Microsoft’s Internet Explorer is not supported as IE does not provide necessary functionalities. Other browsers like Opera are unsupported, too, but may work without any issues.
